name: Ivanoile ~ Christalixeur Corruption (itch) (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté)
description:
Haley, an orphan.

Ivanoile, a Christalixeur.

Their own Corruption.

The Christalixeur’s Corruption.

"Ivanoile ~ Christalixeur Corruption" is a story in an episodic format. It contains two type of Quick Time Events and simple rpg-like battles. Some lovecraftian influence as well.

Oh and also a cameo from Iliana ("Divine D.I.V.A."), Chiko ("Hack the Core") and Aimé ("A.L.A.N.: Rift Breakers") + bonus story after completation. 

Dual Language Screen!
